name: Blocks Master
description:
Tangram Puzzles is a free exciting block match puzzle game - simply drag the blocks and try to fill all the grids (like in tangram).

Game RULES
• Drag the blocks to move them.
• Aim to fit them all into the frame.
• Blocks can't be rotated.
• Touch blocks to remove them from the field.
• Switch game mode by clicking button in header.


Game FEATURES
• 3 game modes: square, hexa and triangle blocks.
• Easy to play.
• No time pressure.
• Infinite tangram puzzles.
• Global Ranking tracker.
• Family category support(filter sensitive ads).
• No internet required (play offline).
